inn1.comm: angling it into leg stump, shooting up from a good length, tries to whip it fine but is caught on the thighs, gets a leg bye
fullish, getting a bit of movement into the left hander, lands on middle and leg, turned away wristily wide of midwicket for a single
lands on a good length on leg stump, holds its line this time, gets back and clips it through square leg for three runs
getting it to dart back in from slightly short of a good length outside off, Junaid gets back to defend, gets an inside edge into the rib cage
swinging in towards leg stump, tries to drive it hard through midwicket but fails to connect, clips his shoes on the way to the keeper, will be disappointed he didn't get that away

does so this time, makes up for the lapse off the previous delivery, full on the pads, clipped away elegantly between mid-on and midwicket for three more, what's more it's a no-ball, so freehit time, poor stuff
sees the left-hander making room and follows him, Tamim tries to heave it over midwicket but mistimes it, only manages a single but an expensive start by Rainsford
gets some good bounce, slightly short on the off, holds its line, Tamim stands tall and defends it towards point
and again, gets Tamim in a spot of bother there, similar delivery, tries to punch it off the back foot towards cover, it's angling in and he gets an inside edge wide of fine leg for a couple of runs
back of a length on the off, testing Tamim with the short one, pushed off the back foot to mid-off
short, identical length but a little too straight this time, Tamim gets into position perfectly, rocking on the back foot and turning it away through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
variation in length, full outside off, a half-volley almost, Tamim gets forward and drives it through mid-off and extra cover for two more, nice positive start
full and wide, gets forward and square-drives it to point, opened the face there, timing it well
Rainsford gifts Junaid with an overpitched delivery outside off, he gets forward, leans into the drive to dispatch it wide of mid-off for a boundary
too full, on middle and off, gets forward and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
angling it in towards leg stump from wide of the crease, kept a little low as he tried to work it square, struck on the pads but it would have been sliding down, got a bit of inside edge as well
in the blockhole outside off, is a little late it trying to dig it out, gets a thick outside edge, all along the ground, to slip
altering his length slightly, short of a good length just outside off, punched to mid-off from the crease
lands on a good length just outside off, no movement, gets forward and defends it rock solid towards cover
full on middle and is met with a strong drive through the line, but it's straight back to the bowler who bends low to stop it on the follow-through
short of a length on leg stump, has plenty of time to rock back and drop it towards midwicket

edged, short of a good length just outside off, hangs his bat out, is a little surprised by the extra bounce, tries to keep it down with soft hands, rolls down to third man for a single, there's just one slip in place
pushes him back with a short one on middle and off, dabs it between the bowler and mid-on for a quick, well-run single
similar  deliver, shortish on middle and off, dropped towards cover off the back foot
trying to work him up with a short one, Tamim rocks back and opens the face at the last moment to guide it down to third man for a single
slightly short on the off, trying to hit the pitch hard, defended solidly towards point from the crease
sucked him into the drive with a full delivery outside off, was a little late on it and ended up getting an inside edge onto his shoe
wide of the crease, firing it in towards middle and off, defended to cover off the back foot, shorter this time
uppish but in the gap, overpitched just outside off, Junaid gets forward and witha  flourish creams that between point and cover, beautifully timed, sped off the bat
shortish on middle, gets back and punches it down towards cover
good length just outside off, is a little cautious this time, gets to the pitch and defends it respectfully towards cover

Tamim launches into one this time, it's full, meaty and juicy outside off, flays it through point from the crease but not wide enough from third man who has time to run to his left and cut that off, they get a couple
immediately prompts Chigumbura to alter his length, drops it short on middle, worked away to midwicket off the back foot
short of a good length just outside off, punched through the line to mid-off
back of a length on middle, dabbed just wide of the bowler and mid-on, enough time to breeze through for a single
banged it in short on middle and leg, mistimed a pull there, was there to hit, he intended to clear midwicket but the timing just isn't there
back of a length, gets back and defends it watchfully just short of cover to end a much better over
slightly short on the off, defended off the back foot in the direction of cover
short of a good length on middle, punches it hard down the ground but is unable to beat mid-off, just a single
good length just a fraction outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
the ball tilts in towards middle from round the stumps and the batsman uses the angle to clip it to deep midwicket region
slightly short in length, Tamim lifts his front leg in the air and plays a eye-catching calypso style pull shot past square leg
outside off stump and Tamim eases it to the off side
from over the stumps, the slower bouncer and Siddique is early into the pull, adjusts to the pace of the ball, checks his shot and sort of laps it around the corner
rushes through the off-stump channel and Siddiqui is beaten, trying to glide it to third man
Bang! a tad fuller, around the off stump line and Siddique leans forward to wallop it high over mid-on
length delivery angling away from Junaid who turns it to thirdman for a single
swing and a miss. In the corridor outside off, slightly wide perhaps, and he tried to slash it through covers but failed to make contact
stays adjacent to the line of a length delivery on the off stump line and pushes it down to third man
from round the stumps, short in length, on the middle stump line, turned to square leg
full in length, on the middle and off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
full pitched outside off stump, sliced away to point region
slower yorker , dug out to the on side
slightly wide outside off stump, mistimes the shot to covers
tilting in from outside off, full, tries to dab it to third man, the ball rolls off the edge to the left of the keeper
short of a good length just outside off, cramping the batsman, Tamim makes way and guides it to point
straying on the pads this time, whipped away fine, Masakadza gives chase from short fine leg and keeps it down to a couple
much fuller this time, good length just a fraction outside off, pulls off a textbook defense in the direction of mid-off
too straight and gets the treatment this time, just a turn of the wrists produces a faint tickle and he gets it well wide of short fine to the boundary, delicately done
we haven't seen the pull shot being employed too often today, banged in short outside off and Tamim is late to react, tries to clear square leg but makes no contact
slower one this time, short on leg stump and cutting in towards middle, closes the face and works it just wide of short fine for a single
round the wicket, shortish on middle and off, punched from the crease towards midwicket
angling in towards off from wide of the crease, played straight to cover off the front foot
firing it in towards middle, pushed back to the bowler, trying to play as straight as possible is Tamim
a touch fuller, too straight, bang on middle, worked away towards deep midwicket for a single to bring up the 50-partnership
banged in short on middle, did well to rock back and pull it down towards deep midwicket for a single, all along the ground that, rolled his wrists over it
a touch too full this time, driven stylishly through midwicket and mid-on into the deep for a couple of runs
round the wicket and starts off with a wide down the leg side, one run gifted
tossed it up, lands full on middle and leg, pushed down to midwicket
slightly quicker through the air, on middle and off, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
angling it in towards middle and leg, worked away through midwicket for a single

loopy and almost produced a result, flighted just outside off, the batsman stepped out and tried to drive it through mid-on, got the leading edge as it spun away and it fell just short of Utseya as he dived to his right
on middle and leg, defended on the leg side towards midwicket, decent start by the captain
starts off, like his captain, with a wide down the leg side, another run given away
and again, he's coming round the wicket and is getting his direction wrong, wide down the leg side to add one more to the Bangladesh score
back of a length just on the off, gets back and drops it down towards cover, much better
normal services resumed, another one down the leg side, Tamim's tried to glance those fine each time and failed but he won't mind the end result
too straight but at least he didn't hurl another one down the leg side, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single
short of a good length just outside off, jabs it towards mid-on from the crease
lands on a good length on middle and leg, pushed through the line wide of midwicket for a single
a bit of a slinger is Chibhabha, on middle and leg, turned wide of a diving midwicket into the deep for a single, thinks of a second but Matsikenyeri is quick on his feet to prevent it
good length on middle and leg, drives it through the line back to the bowler who fields well bending low on his follow through
the umpire's a generous man, tossed up, it's down the leg side and though it turns back in it should have been given a wide
spins away from a good length on middle and off as he tries to work it square, gets the leading edge but is wide of point, a single taken
tossed up on middle, whipped away through square leg for one more
much flatter, shortish on the off, rocks back and pushes that to cover
gives it some air this time, fullish on middle and leg, driven down the ground for a single to long-on
threw it up, low full toss on leg stump, driven straight to midwicket
shortish on leg stump, rocks back and punches it past the bowler for a single
a bit more effort there indicated by the grunt as he hurled it down, fullish on middle and off, driven back to the bowler, off the middle but couldn't place it
fullish, just a fraction outside off, opens the face to guide it behind point towards third man who runs across to his left to keep them down to a single
slower one bowled full on middle and off, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
finally employs the pull, short on middle and leg, flayed  but straight to midwicket

nicely done, innovative there, he would have been tempted to drive that through cover as it was overpitched outside off but he waited for it and just at the last moment opened the face to guide it past the keeper and third man to the ropes

run-out, Just as I said that a wicket has fallen. Pushed off the front foot to midwicket or just wide of him, Junaid called for a single but was sent back after he had covered enough ground for Chibhabha to hurl a strong throw to the wicketkeeper Taylor and take down the stumps in time, a crucial wicket, against the run of play
tossed it up just outside off, square driven through point for a single, he's off the mark straightaway
on middle and off, drawing him forward, defended back to the bowler

ooh, that was unlucky for the bowler, flat, just outside leg and Tamim, frustrated by the dismissal as well as a blip in scoring, finally decided to cut loose and went for a slog-sweep only to miss it, it went through him and evaded the leg stump by a whisker, the keeper failed to get his hands to it and Bangladesh get four
worked away into the leg side through square leg for a single
flighted on middle and off, closes the face and pushes it back to the bowler
flighted outside off from round the wicket, driven straight back to him and he misfields to allow them a single to long-off
threw it up well outside off, gets forward and crashes it through to deep cover
flighted it just on leg stump, driven down to long-on for a single
down the leg side not for the first time, pitched on middle and spun down leg, surprising that was not given
it is this time, flat and kept a little low but spinning down and they get a run
tossed up just outside off, Ashraful tried to guide it past point but missed it as it spun back in
short and wide, reaches for it and chops it down towards deep point where a fumble allows them to rush back for the second
threw it up just on leg stump and it turned back in towards middle, turned to midwicket
stump-to-stump, on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
fullish on leg stump, driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
spun in sharply from a good length outside off to beat Ashraful through the gate, struck high on the pads just outside the line
flighted it up on the off stump, reached forward and defended it with a straight bat
spun in from outside off, got outside the line and defended it with bat close to pad
tossed it up just outside off, gets front and across and pushes it back to the bowler
spun in from outside off, rocked back and mistimed a cut towards cover
short and low on leg stump, turned away through the leg-side field into the deep for a single
drifting in towards middle, coming round the wicket to the right hander, makes room and jabs it towards cover
good bowling, saw him coming down and fired it flat and short, much quicker but Ashraful adjusted well to defend that to cover
turning away from a good length outside off, opens the face and drops it between cover and point for a single
flighted on middle and leg, pushed back into the leg side and Utseya dives to his right to prevent the single
on middle and leg, dropped short of midwicket to steal a quick single
fullish outside off, crunched down the ground to long-on for a single
slightly short just outside off, waited for it to turn in and dabbed it behind short third man for a single
gets a thick inside edge towards square leg, it was tossed up on middle and he tried to drive that inside out towards cover, it didn't turn
watchful is Mr. Ashraful as he gets forward and drop it towards cover, getting to the pitch there and defending with a straight bat
turning in from a good length on the off stump, worked to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, Tamim is sucked into playing the sweep but makes no contact as it turns down leg, just missed the leg stump
fell just short, quicker through the air just outside off, Tamim steps forward and flicks it uppishly towards midwicket, it lands just short as he dives forward to pouch it
on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
slightly short on middle, waits for it to turn in and turns it straight to square leg
threw it up just outside off, driven down to long-on for a single
flighted outside off, gets across, tries to driven it through midwicket but gets an inside edge onto his pads
pushed away into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
dragged it short this time, enough time for Ashraful to get back and cut it past point for a couple of runs
quicker and flatter, on middle and off, played back to the bowler
waited for it to turn in and tapped it just wide of midwicket to complete quick single, Matisnkenyeri was quick to get to it but the batsmen communicated well
angling it in towards middle from round the wicket, Ashraful is cautious, getting back and tapping it back on the pitch
gets forward this time, flighted on middle and it's the same result

hesitation from Ashraful who turns it towards short fine, Tamim calls for a single but Ashraful is very late in his response while sending him back, it's a poor throw at the non-striker's end and Tamim is safe
well played, erred in line there and Ashraful was quick to capitalize, full and wide down the leg side, paddles it comfortably to the fine-leg boundary
spun away and he tapped it between cover and point for a single to bring up the 100
lands on a good length just outside off, gets across and works it between square leg and midwicket for a single
flatter through the air, on middle and off, appeared to hold its line, pushed down to cover
slightly short on the off, turned away and he slapped it down to deep cover for a single
flighted just outside off, got front and across and turned it through midwicket but Price was a little slow to come in from the deep and they take two
two more as he hurls it short and wide, cut away hard through point before deep point runs to his left to cut that off
just outside off, gets forward and pushes it to cover
slightly short just outside off, opens the face and taps it down towards point
quickish and full on middle, swipes it down towards deep midwicket for a single
attemps the paddle again, it's slightly down the leg side and Ashraful will be disappointed he didn't get some bat on it
slightly short on the off stump, taps it short of cover and rushes through for a single
flighted it outside off, trying to suck him into the drive, lunges forward as he pushes it towards cover
tossed it up outside off, got across and tried to sweep it fine, got a bit of a top edge as it landed short of short fone
spun back in from a good length outside off, chopped down to point
short of a good length outside off, run down to third man for a single
consecutive fifties for the left-hander as he drives that through the line to long-on, his tenth ODI half-century, a steady innings, this

slower this time and gets it to cut back in  from a good length outside off, Ashraful is only half-forward and tries to defend it lethargically, makes no contact, plays inside the line and is struck plumb in front of middle and leg
lands on a good length outside off from round the wicket, drives it on the up towards cover
Shakib gets into the act quickly, short and wide and he cuts it hard behind point for a single down to third man
pushes it wide of the left-hander and Tamim creams it hard but straight to the deep-cover fielder for a single
sliding it on middle and leg, turned through square leg for a single
gave it plenty of air, tossed it up just outside off, driven down to long-on for a single
Tamim's eyes lit up as he saw that being tossed up, he charged down the track and struck it back to the bowler
slightly short on the off, pushed it off the back foot wide of the bowler down to long-on for a single
turned down to short fine from the crease, no single on offer there
full and quick on the off stump, driven down to long-off for a single with a straight bat, showed the full face there
slower one and he picked it beautifully, full outside off and Tamim clears the long-off boundary with a free swing of the arms, powerfully struck and he gets a pressure-relieving six
short and wide, goes for the cut, the shot was on and he'll regret having missed it

smashed, the line wasn't right for the shot but Tamim had made up his mind, short of a good length on middle and off, charges down the track and hammers it back past the bowler who is lucky to evade it, the umpire's luckier and Tamim gets four more
excellent improvisation, short and wide, no aggression this time but a deft touch as he guides it really fine, well wide of third man for a single
missed out there, strayed on leg stump, tried to tickle it fine but it ended up brushing his pads, just a single
pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket
driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot wide of the diving bowler who just about manages to get his hands to it to prevent the single
spun back in from outside off, chopped down to cover
keeping it short is Price, and he's getting quite a bit of turn as well, Shakib gets back and punches it back to the bowler
starts with a wide down the leg side, they've bowled a few of those today
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down to long-on for a single
short on the off stump, waited for it to turn away and slapped it down to deep cover
almost chopped it on, short outside off, tried to punch it past cover but got an inside edge just over the leg stump
full on middle and leg, thumps it down the ground to long-on
tossed it up, well wide of the off stump, struck straight to cover
quick and flat well outside off, fired it hard and Shakib let it go
lands on a good length just outside off, turned down towards square leg
flighted it well outside off, got well across to paddle it fine but didn't connect as well as he wanted to
flatter just outside off, driven to long-off for a single
flighted on middle and off, cracked down the ground to long-on
turns in from outside off, gets back, drops his hands and works it wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle, gets back and thumps it down to long-on for one more
flighted on leg stump, pushed down the ground and the bowler and non-striker collide, no damage done though
fullish on middle and leg, flicked away through midwicket for one more
threw it up outside off, went for a slog-sweep over midwicket bit it turned away to beat the swing of the bat
quick full toss on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
tossed up outside off, driven hard to cover, straight to him and the powerful shot yields no runs
Tamim's ploy pays off as he dismisses a tossed-up delivery outside off between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary to bring up the 150 for Bangladesh
hurling it full on middle, pushed straight to cover
slightly short on leg stump, whipped away through square leg, the fielder in the deep takes a while to cut that off and they have enough time to come back for the second
lands full on middle, driven hard down the ground towards ;long-on for a single
slightly short on the off, punched between cover and point for a single
fullish just outside off, driven firmly towards cover where the diving fielder gets his hands to it to keep them down to a single

run-out, slower one down the leg side, Tamim tries to work it fine but doesn't make contact, the keeper fumbles and Tamim calls for the single but is sent back by Shakib, the hesitation gives Taylor time to recover, collect and throw down the stumps at the striker's end to find Tamim miles short of his ground
flighted on middle and leg, turns it towards deep square leg for a single
short of a good length on the off, pushed in the direction of cover
Raqibul takes little time to announce his presence, overpitched outside off, there's plenty of space in the outfield and he smacks it high over midwicket for a boundary
short and wide, it's there to cut and he plays it but straight to point
timing it well, lands on a good length outside off, gets to the pitch and drives it down to mid-off
fullish just outside off, pushed straight to cover, good recovery from the bowler after being smashed for a boundary early in the over
on middle and leg, worked away wristily through square leg, Vermuelen takes time to cut that off from fine leg and they get two
short of a good length on the off, punched hard through to deep cover for a single
cheeky stuff, short of a length just on and outside off, opened the face at the last moment to run it wide of third man for a couple
angling it in towards middle and off, driven wide of mid-on for a single
we haven't seen too many pulls being played today but Shakib executes this perfectly, it's short and wide, he got into position to early to thwack it through midwicket for a welcome boundary
back of a length just outside off, punched to cover from the crease
short of a length just outside off, cracked through to deep point for a single
just a fraction short and Shakib is onto it quickly, rocks back and pulls it away over midwicket to beat the gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
fullish outside off, swatted hard towards mid-off who does well to get his body behind the ball to prevent any runs
clears him comfortably this time, it's overpitched and he stamps his foot down, striking him hard over extra cover for four more
short and wide, misses out as he fails to connect an attempted cut
hurls it just wide of leg stump, Shakib tries to force it through midwicket but is struck on the pads
edged, not sure if that was done deliberately, tossed it up just outside off, turned away and Raqibul opened the face, went wide of short third, they get three
flat on middle and leg, driven hard through the line to long-on
flighted it on middle, shuffled slightly and worked it behind square for a single
flatter trajectory, fullish outside off, drags it wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle, punched back to the bowler from the crease
shortish on middle and off, tapped to cover off the back foot
pushed through straight and short just outside off, played back to the bowler
fullish on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
on middle and leg, worked away through square leg for a single
wherever the pain is, Shakib's unflustered, it's bowled in the slot, on a length on middle, Shakib slog-sweeps that to deposit it into the stands over deep midwicket for a mighty six
another one, a rubbish delivery, full toss on middle and he murders it in the same direction, a much bigger hit, this, sails into the crowd over deep midwicket
quick and flat outside off, drags it wide of square leg for a single to keep the strike, brings up the 200
Price slips that down the leg side and gifts a wide
tosses it up on middle, gets front and across and tries to turn it fine, gets a single just short of short fine
flighted on middle, worked away towards short fine for another single
slightly short on the off, charges down and bunts it down the ground to long-on
Raqibul raises the 50-stand with a dab wide of cover, Shakib's been the chief destroyer
gets to the pitch beautifully with a dance down the track, fullish on middle, clipped over midwicket for a couple of runs to bring up his half-century
flighted on the off, charges down the track and drills it back towards the bowler who fails to get down in time to stop that, rolls through his legs to the boundary, 11 off the over
full and wide, tries to flay it through the off side, the shot was on but he didn't connect
Raqibul, full and wide, stays rooted in the crease and smacks it hard over mid-on for a one-bounce four
in the blockhole just outside off and Raqibul fails to get his bat down in time, is lucky that wasn't bowled on the stumps
another one, reaches for it this time and again fails to make contact, Taylor fumbles behind the stumps and they steal a bye
Shkaib makes room and drives that inside out towards cover
missed run-out, driven down to mid-off for a quick single but had that been a direct hit at the non-striker's end, Shakib was gone
he's making the best use of the field restrictions, Utseya bowls it full and wide, Shakib makes room and lofts it over cover for a boundary, the field is up and he's taking full toll
massive six, tossed up on the off stump, charges down the track and lofts it through the line over long-off for a big one
short outside leg stump, tries to help it fine, is struck on the pads

dropped, Matsikenyeri spills a sitter, tossed it up outside off, Shakib went for the reverse sweep, trying to clear cover, got the top edge and Matsikenyeri, at the edge of the circle, had all the time in the world to get into position to pouch it but spilt the easiest of chances
turned into the leg side for a single
Shakib makes the most of Matsinkeyer's lapse, coming down the track and smashing it over extra cover for another four
straying on the pads and Raqibul shuffles to bend low and scoop it wide of short fine leg for a boundary, this is a destructive stand
lands on a good length outside off, opens the face to guide it behind point for a single

another drop, Ray Price drops a dolly, full on middle, Shakib walks across to play a Misbahesque scoop over short fine, miscues it and Price is right under it but, again, the butter fingers result in an embarrassment
adding insult to injury, in the slot, length ball outside off, driven hard down the ground, wide of the bowler, and long-on, for a boundary
pushed through the line to long-on for a single
full toss on middle and leg, much slower through the air once he saw the batsman making room, tapped into the leg side for a single
wide, was a full toss well wide of the off stump, Shakib let it go and the keeper fumbled it to allow another run
four more, full toss again, tried to run it down to third man, got a thin edge into the ground and it bounced over Taylor to roll down the boundary
finally, slower one bowled full outside off, makes room to clear mid-off but is unable to do so as Coventry, right at the circle, times his jump well to pluck it

Chibhabha, you beauty! They've been embarrassed by those two dropped chances but this one was simply superb, restoring some lost pride, Short on the off and Naeem Islam upper-cut that in the direction of third man, Chibhabha, the fielder there, ran yards to his left and dived full length to hold on to an excellent low catch
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, driven down towards long-off, just a single
fullish on the off, driven between long-ff and deep cover for a couple of runs to get off the mark
starts off with a full toss, poor delivery, smashed away over midwicket for a one bounce four, a gift promptly accepted
lands on a good length just outside off, swings hard and gets a thick inside edge just wide of deep square leg for a couple
Shakib's in the zone today, full and wide, makes room and carts that powerfully wide of long-off for a flat six
straight off the middle, full, length delivery just outside off, clatters it over the bowler's head for a one bounce four, what a knock
he's not getting his length right here, slower one bowled full outside off, clears cover and has enough time to come back for the second
full outside off, drilled down towards long-off for a single to keep the strike, Chibhabha's been hammered
full toss again, rubbish bowling, pulled away into the deep, there's cover this time which keeps them down to just a single
short of a good length outside off, drops it behind point with soft hands for a single to give Shakib the strike, well done
slower offcutter bowled short  outside off, punched from the crease towards  long-off for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, guided down to third man for a single
short and wide, cut away straight to point
swinging hard is Shakib even though he knows he's nearing a ton, gets a thick outside edge behind point for a single

in the blockhole on middle, dug out in the direction of deep cover for a couple as Sean Williams takes time to cut if off, he hurls a poor throw well wide of the keeper and the batsmen take two overthrows in the direction of deep square leg, four more, all run, thanks to some atrocious fielding
full and wide, smacked through the line to long-off for a single,
erring in line, strays down the leg side, one more run added to the mounting total
firing it full on middle, swats it down to long-on for a single
fullish just outside off, pushed down to mid-off for a quick single to bring up his third ODI ton, leading by example for the umpteenth time
pulls off the scoop superbly this time, it's a low full toss on leg stump, shuffles across and helps it over short fine leg for a boundary

run-out, tosses it up outside off, Mushfiqur slices it behind point and takes two easily but Shakib is intent to taking three and charges down the pitch but there's no response from his partner who is ball-watching, the throw gets to the keeper who rolls the ball down to the bowler, he takes off the bails to find the Bangladesh captain well short of his ground
tossed it up on the off, lofted it between long-off and deep cover for a boundary, the scoring refuses to abate
pushed off the front foot towards cover for a single
fires it full and wide, the batsman leaves it alone expecting it to be called a wide but the umpire thinks its fine
full on the off stump, in the slot and Raiqbul slogs it over midwicket for a boundary, takes Bangladesh to their highest ODI score
attempts a similar shot but gets an inside edge onto his pads this time
pushed through towards extra cover for a single
four more, you can't be doling out freebies at this stage of the innings, drilled hard down the ground past the bowler and wide of long-on for a boundary, was overpitched and got the treatment
cracked wide of midwicket for single, didn't get hold of it

another run-out, the fourth of the innings, it's full and wide and Mushfiqur smashes it back towards Rainsford who palms it back onto the stumps at the non-striker's end to find Mahmudullah, who's backed up too far, short of his ground
full toss on middle, bunts it down to long-on for a single
fired in full on middle, chipped down towards long-on for a single
pushed away into the leg side for one more
bowled full outside off, drilled hard down towards long-off for a single
gets forward and tries to drive it past midwicket, is struck on the pads, appeared to strike him in line but the umpire thought otherwise

dragged from outside off towards long-on for a single, rushes back for the second but there's a really late response from the striker's end, the throw is a little slow to come in and he completes it just in time
short outside off, tries to pull it towards midwicket, gets a thick edge towards cover and had the fielder scored a direct hit at the non-striker's end, he was a gonner
full and wide, swings across the line, miscues it but it lands safe short of long-off as they get another single
slower offcutter, completey deceives Enamul who is too early into the attempted pull, is beaten through the gate and the ball crashes into middle and off
dropped short of point from the crease for a single
slower one again, took forever to get to the batsman, tried to cut it hard past point but didn't connect, a dot ball to end the innings

inn2.comm: the ideal start for the home team as Rasel pitches it short and Vermeulen pulls it away disdainfully between midwicket and mid-on for a boundary
short of a good length on the off, stays rooted to the crease and punches it to mid-off
another short one, a slower offcutter, a gift, really. Vermeulen has no trouble dragging it over midwicket for his second boundary, poor start by Rasel
much better, lands on a good length on middle and off, crunched wide of a diving cover for a single, good stop in the end, had struck it firmly
Masakadza is away immediately, short of a good length on leg stump, whipped through square leg for a single
slower offcutter, on target this time, pitches it on a good length on middle and off, Vermeulen gets forward and defends it with bat close to pads
tossed it up outside off, driven hard but straight to short cover, Mahmudullah palms it off towards mid-off and they get a single
flighted it outside off, Vermeulen just chips it over the in-field on the off side in the direction of extra cover and gets three
on middle and off, driven back to the bowler, fullish and he played it with a straight bat
good intent by Zimbabwe, on middle and leg, giving it some air, Masakadza leans forward, bends low and sweeps it hard behind square leg for a boundary
gets an inside edge as he tries to drive it inside out wide of cover, a single wide of short fine
angling it in towards middle and leg from round the wicket, bowled flat this time, Vermeulen tries to work it square but is struck on the pads, there's an appeal but it may have been sliding down
slightly short on middle and leg, gets back and punches it back to the bowler, there's no movement
slightly short on leg stump, punched off the back foot to long-on for a single
in the channel outside off, struck off the front foot straight to cover
slower offcutter, lands short on middle and off, makes room and chops it down towards point
overpitched and Vermeulen cashes in, getting to pitch and carting it over mid-off and extra cover for another four, firmly hit
what is he appealing for? Coming over the wicket, pitched outside leg and cut in, tried to sweep it fine, was struck on the pads and Rasel lets out an ear-shattering scream which yields nothing
angling it in towards middle and spun away sharply to beat the outside edge as he tried to drive it through the line
and again, quicker through the air, Masakadza fishes for it outside off and is surprised by the turn once again, very unconvincing there
slightly short on middle, pushed away wide of midwicket for a couple of runs
slightly short on the off, turns away sharply, opens the face at the last moment to guide that past point for two more
fires it in hard on leg stump and Masakadza is beaten by the pace as well as the slow bounce, is struck low on the pads but it was sliding down
short of a good length on the off, pushed to the bowler off the back foot, testing over from Shakib
shortish on middle and leg, worked uppishly but just short of midwicket
missed out there, slower one bowled short on middle, was into the shot a little too early, tried to pull it past midwicket, got an inside edge onto his pads

he's given him! Bowled on a length, appeared to pitch on leg and angle in towards middle, Vermeulen went for the sweep, missed and was struck in line with middle and off. The umpire raised his finger fairly quickly. Replays indicate the ball landed just marginally outside leg, a close call, that.
slower one on middle and off, gets back and pushes it back to the bowler
short of a good length on middle, turned away off the back foot through square leg for a single to get off the mark
got a bit of movement towards the right hander, gets forward to defend but plays inside the line, the ball zips past the outside edge
short of a good length on the off, tries to force it hard through cover, gets an inside edge onto the pads

slightly short on the off, gets back, stands tall and punches it wide of mid-off for a quick single, was late to set off and would have been found short had there been a direct hit at the non-striker's end
back of a length on middle, comes down the track and punches it down to mid-on
slower one bowled full on the off stump, slapped down to mid-off for a quick single
angling it in towards middle and leg, gets across to turn it in the direction of midwicket, is struck high on the pads and the ball rolls down towards point, rushes through for a single
slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot wide of mid-on for a single
fullish on middle and off, gets to the pitch and defends with bat close to pad towards mid-off

bowled'im! Slower one on middle and off, Masakadza bends low to swing across the line in an attempt to clear midwicket, gets an inside edge straight into the stumps, the promising start has been laid to rest
lands on a length just outside leg stump and moves in towards middle, gets across the line to drive it past midwicket, is struck on the pads
slower one on leg stump, tries to clip it fine, brushes the pads and rolls wide of short fine for a couple of runs
short of a good length on middle, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
sweetly timed, slightly short on middle, rocks back and punches it wide of mid-on for a single
firing it straight on leg stump, worked through midwicket for a single
cutting into the right hander, on middle and leg, gets across the line to work it square, is struck on the pads but it probably would have been sliding down
won't be fair to call it a drop, short on the off stump, slapped hard just over mid-on where the fielder didn't time his dive well enough, flew past him to the boundary
beautifully timed again, presented the full face of the bat as he punched it back past the bowler but straight onto the stumps at the non-striker's end, they get a single off the ricochet
landing on a good length on leg stump, pushed just wide of mid-on for one more
slower one bowled full outside of leg, it cut back in to strike him on the pads as he tried to work it towards midwicket
fullish outside off, drives without any footwork, gets an inside edge wide of short fine for a single
shortish on leg stump, tucked away towards deep midwicket for a single
slower one bowled on a good length on middle, pushed down towards cover from the crease
in the slot outside off, it's a half-volley driven straight to cover off the front foot
slower one bowled full on middle, driven through the line wide of the bowler towards mid-off for a single
slower one bowled full outside off, gets into position to play the slog-sweep but he's nowhere near it
back of a length on middle, pulled away just to the right of deep square leg for a single
slower one on middle, pushed off the back foot towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle, makes room and thumps it towards cover at the edge of the circle, he has enough time to complete the single
slower one bowled on a good length on middle, worked towards square leg for a single, brings up the 50
tries to heave it over  midwicket, lands full outside leg, another offcutter, cutting in towards middle to strike him on the pads, you can't give that out
full and wide, gets to the pitch and clatters it over the covers for a boundary, confidently done
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket, closed the face at the right time there
full outside off, waits for it and squeezes it through to cover
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, defended off the front foot to cover, solidly done but they need to get a move-on
fullish on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
shortish on middle, pulled away over square leg for a couple wide of a diving deep square leg, he palms it off as he dives to save it and Zimbabwe get the extra run
poor delivery, short on middle, gets into position early and deposits it over midwicket for a welcome boundary
low full toss on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off

he's gone now! The slower one coming from the back of the hand, low full toss outside off, just pushes it through the line without and lobs it straight to Junaid Siddique placed perfectly at extra cover
short of a length outside off, dropped down towards point
straying on the pads, clips it towards fine leg for a single to get off the mark
slightly short on middle, pushed down to midwicket
slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a single
fullish on middle, turned behind square for a single
in the slot on middle, Taylor is in a cautious mood early on defending it with a straight bat to the bowler
slower one bowled full outside off, eased it into the deep through cover and point for a couple of runs
lands on a good length on and outside off, pushed through to cover
lands full just outside off, driven through to mid-off, played solidly
picked the slower one there, back of the hand again, lands full outside off, crashes it wide of long-off for a couple of runs
angling in towards middle and off, pushed through the line to long-off
slightly short on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
short of a good length on the off, punched through to mid-off for a quick single
overpitched outside off, drilled down the ground towards long-off, just one
angling it in towards leg stump, turns away, he's covered it well though as he pushes it to mid-on
tossed up on middle and off, driven straight to cover after getting to the pitch
flighted outside off, pushed wide of the bowler in the direction of long-on for a single
short on middle, punched off the back foot to midwicket
quickish on middle and off, pushed to cover from the crease
saw him coming down and pitched it slightly short, Taylor tried to close the face but did so a little too early, gets a leading edge short of point
Coventry welcomes him with a mammoth six over the bowler's head, tossed up on the middle and off, he charges down the track and deposits into the stands above long-off
sensible batting as he pushes this down the ground to long-off for a single
flighted on middle, pushed down towards long-on for one more to give Coventry the strike
six more, he's targeting Naeem here, tossed it up on middle, danced down the track, got to the pitch and with a free swing of the arms he smashed it over long-off again
chose to be watchful there, lunged forward to defend it into the off side
and again, on middle and off, defended onto the pitch
cheeky, low full toss just outside leg, paddled wide of short fine for three more
firing it short outside off, it's angling in, gets outside the line to paddle it fine, is struck on the pads
goes for the paddle again, gets a top edge but it lands safe, there's no short fine and they get a single
shortish on middle and off, comes down the track and defend it into the off side, is hit on the pads

tame dismissal, that! Short of a good length on middle and off, the ball appears to stop on him just a little, not much turn there, Taylor is already committed to pushing it through the line off the front foot, lobs it straight back to the bowler who completes a good catch moving to his right
angling in towards middle and off from round the wicket, pushed back to the bowler
slightly short on middle and off, defended into the off side
tossed up outside off, worked towards midwicket
crunched through the off side towards deep cover for a single
fired it full outside off, came down the track and swung it towards deep midwicket for a single
shortish on leg stump from round the wicket, would have been sliding down as it struck him on the pads while he was trying to whip it past midwicket
shortish on middle, pushed off the front foot to midwicket
slower through the air, worked wide of midwicket for a single
turning in from a good length outside off, played back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, turning in towards middle, punched to midwicket
an element of frustration there as he reaches forward and slog-sweeps it towards deep midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle and off, gets back and thwacks it through midwicket for a single
round the wicket, short on the off stump, gets back and punches it to cover
on the back foot again, maintaining a shortish length to the right-hander after he was smashed for two sixes, played wide of cover for a single
lands on a length outside off, driven through the line to long-off
comes down the track and bunts it down to long-off for one more
fired it quick on middle and off, reverse-swept it straight to point
breaks the shackles, dropped it short on middle, rocked back and whipped it into the gap between square leg and short fine for a boundary
angling it in towards middle and leg, gets an inside edge onto the pads as he tries to turn it off the front foot
slightly short on middle, gets back and thumps it down to long-on
seized the length early there, short on the off, pulled away but straight to deep midwicket for a single
tossed it up outside of, driven down to long-off, one more
bowled it flat outside off, gets across the line to slog it over midwicket, struck him on the pads but well outside the line
back of a length on the off, smacked hard but again straight to the fielder in the deep, deep midwicket cuts it off
fired it straight on middle and off from round the wicket, got well outside the line to paddle it fine, was struck on the front pad just marginally outside the line
turned away down towards long leg for a single

the non-striker was struck hard, short outside off, comes down the track and smashes it past the bowler straight onto Williams' wrist as he tries to evade it, deprives his partner of a half-century, only off that ball
Coventry reaches his half-century by working it wide of midwicket for a single, a fighting innings, his second ODI fifty
short on middle, goes for the pull, times it well and fortunately for him, it lands short of deep midwicket, just a single
swept down fine, wide of the fielder in the in-field on the leg side for a single

dropped, tossed up outside leg stump, sweeps it hard, gets a bit of a top edge and Tamim placed perfectly for that shot at long leg spills a sitter, was looking into the sun, at least that's what he indicated but how costly will it prove?
pushes it down the ground to long-on
worked away off the front foot wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, slaps it down the  ground to long-on for a single
dropped off the front foot towards short third man, calls for a single but is wisely sent back
starts with a waist-high full toss on middle, punched down the ground to long-on
fired it full outside off, employed the reverse-sweep, tried to play it fine, wide of short third, but didn't connect
fullish outside off, driven through the line to long-off
drifting into the pads, walks across and turns it through square leg for a couple, fine leg takes a while to rush in and cut it off
tossed up on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
bowling it on a length on middle and off, chipped down towards long-off for a single
slightly short on middle, forced off the back foot towards deep midwicket for a single
struck straight to midwicket off the front foot
fell just short, short on middle, gets back and punches it uppishly but just inches in front of the bowler who bends low but can't get to it in time
tossed up outside off, reaches forward and drives it back to Enamul
flighted on middle, paddles it down towards fine leg for a single
the reverse-sweep, finally, pays off, fired it full outside off, he got into position early to bisect the gap between point and short third, a welcome boundary
tossed up, it's actually a full toss, charges down the track and deposits it miles over deep midwicket for a six

another promising stand comes to an end, held back the length, dropped it short, Coventry had made his mind up, came down the track and pulled it hard, got more elevation than distance and Naeem at deep midwicket held his nerve to take that comfortably just inches inside the ropes
pushed through the line wide of the bowler for a single to give the new batsman the strike
turned away towards midwicket for a single to get off the mark
driven through the line to long-off for one more
came to the pitch, closed the face and turned it wide of square leg for a single
shortish on middle and off, paddles it fine, a pre-meditated stroke that, just the single

full outside leg stump, clipped to short fine, calls for a single and then decides against it, would have been interesting had there been an accurate throw at the non-striker's end, Matsikenyeri was struggling to make it back
tossed up on middle, swept down wide of deep midwicket for a couple
slog-sweeps it down to the same fielder again for a single
flighted on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
held it back, came down the track and cracked it wide of long-off for a couple of runs
hurled it wide down the leg side, not seen many from the Bangladesh bowlers, quite a few from their opponents, a single off the fumble from the keeper
slightly short outside off, jabs it short of point for a single
tossed it up outside off, driven hard down to long-off, one more
tossed it up outside off, came down the track  to get to the pitch and drove it down to long-off
pushed through to long-on from the crease for a single
low full toss on middle and off, bunts it down to long-on, nine off the over, works well
slightly short on the off stump, slapped back towards the bowler
flighted it on middle, turned away as he got down to play the sweep, struck him on the shoulder
angling it in towards middle, worked towards midwicket off the front foot
slightly quicker through the air, fullish on the off, dropped it short of cover and called for the single, the partner responds well and completes the run in time
looping in towards middle, gets to the pitch and pushes it down to long-on for a single
shortish outside off, paddled towards square leg for a single
on middle and leg, waits for it and turns it to midwicket

shot! Flat and quick just outside off but it's bowled on a length, Williams dances down the track and cracks it just over the leaping extra cover to bisect the gap between long-off and deep cover for a boundary
slightly short on the off, slapped down to long-on for a single
firing it short down the leg side, given a wide
tossed it up on the off stump, dropped it gently short of midwicket for a quick single
slightly short on middle, pushed straight to midwicket
full on leg stump, walks across to sweep it fine, is struck on the pads, they get a leg bye
the reverse-sweep works well for Williams, short outside off, gets into position early and smacks it through point and short third
tossed up on middle, chipped down towards long-on for a single
angling it into off and middle from round the wicket, Matsinkenyeri gives the set batsman the strike, paddling it to long leg
slightly short on the off, waits for it to turn in and chips it towards long-on, one more
flighted outside off, driven hard but straight to extra cover
pushed into the off side off the front foot, landed on middle and off
shortish on middle and off, punched down to long-on, one more, they're doing it well here
straying on the pads, whips it down to deep square leg for a single
he's luck there, full toss on middle and leg, gets down to smack it square but it produces the top edge, lands safe in the short-fine region, they get a couple more
shortish outside off, pushed off the front foot wide of cover but the single isn't there
gets to his half-century by easing it wide of long-off for a couple of runs, reaches his tenth ODI fifty, an innings under pressure but there's much more to be done
tossed it up on middle and off, pushes it back to the bowler
flighting it just outside off, dabbed straight towards point, turns down the single
tossed up outside off, square-driven straight to point, the single isn't there
run-out chance missed, dabbed down to point, Williams calls for a single and charges way down the pitch, no response from the striker, a wayward throw at the non-striker's end saves Williams
worked into the off side between point and cover for a single
two more, tossed up outside off, goes for the reverse slog-sweep, gets the top edge and it lands safe short of deep cover and long-off, he's riding his luck here
gets forward and dabs it through the off side for another single
plays the reverse-sweep, straight to short third this time, hit it well but couldn't find the gap
tossed up outside off, driven hard wide of long-off for a single, some sharp fielding in the deep keeps them to just one
held it back slightly, comes down the track and works it wide of midwicket for a single
in the slot for the slog-sweep, hits it straight to deep midwicket, one more to the total
saw him coming down and dropped it short, pushed it straight to midwicket
short and wide, makes room and cuts it straight to short third, dot ball adding to the pressure
shortish on the off, struck down towards long-off for a single, brings up the 50-stand
flighted well outside off, tries to sweep it square but it turns away to beat the swing of the bat
short on middle, holds its line, goes for the pull and is struck high on the pads
shortish outside off, jabs it wide of cover for a single
fires it on a good length outside leg stump, tries to whip it square, doesn't connect, good over this
flighted on middle and off, swung away to deep midwicket, just the one
good length on middle and off, driven hard on the up back to the bowler who prevents a single on his follow through
slower one on leg stump, pushed straight to midwicket, the pressure builds
saw him making room and chased him, a bit too much though, ends up being a wide
yorker, in the blockhole outside off, Williams can only dig it out towards midwicket
charges down the track this time, takes it from the length and drives it hard down to long-on for a single
lands on a good length on middle and off, pushed towards extra cover from the crease, no single available
slower one bowled full on middle, flicked away wide of deep square leg for a couple of runs, still a fairly tight over
shortish on middle and off, saw him coming down, chipped it towards long-off for a single
fired it on middle, swept it down to long leg for a single
full and quick on middle, gets into position early and reverse-sweeps it hard but straight to extra cover
that was coming, full on middle and off, came down a couple of steps and smashed it hard over midwicket for a one bounce four, a pretty long boundary that, almost a six
quickish just outside off, comes down the track and bunts it down to long-off for a single
drew him forward with a fullish delivery on middle and off, played back to the bowler
straying on the pads, comes down the track and tickles it towards short fine, just the single
low full toss on middle, whipped away just wide of deep midwicket, he's got enough time to come back for the second
rapped on the pads, a slower offcutter there, came down and tried to pull it square, missed, managed a leg bye, would have gone over
Williams is doing the bulk of the hard-work here, full on the pads, dances down the pitch and picks it over midwicket, beats deep midwicket and long-on to the boundary
two more, a spirited effort this, short and wide, cracks it over cover for a couple in front of deep point, this is now his highest ODI score
short of a good length outside leg, makes room and bunts it down to long-on for a single
poor ball, down the leg side, swept hard to long leg, Williams is not happy, missing out on a boundary there, he needed to get it finer
short on the off, jabbed down to long-on for a single
short on middle and off, pulled away to deep midwicket for one more
pushed through quick on middle, driven down hard to long-on, a single to the total

Williams goes! Much slower through the air, varied his pace there and sucked him into the big shot with a tossed-up delivery, landed full on middle and leg, Willaims came down the track, was done in by the pace and lofted it really high, still he managed to time it reasonable well but not well enough as Mahmudullah ran a  couple of yards to his left at long-on to take a well-judged catch just inside the ropes
short and wide, cut away hard behind point, the fielder gives chase but it rolls down the boundary
nicely done, short of a good length just outside off, waited for it to come on and opened the face at just the right time to beat third man to the boundary

gone! Those two boundaries provided just a momentary high, closer to the off stump and Utseya attempts an identical shot but doesn't get it past the keeper this time, straight to Mushfiqur who takes a low catch, the slide is on
shortish on leg stump, turned down towards fine leg for a single
full toss, slipped out of his hand, smashed down to long-on for a single
short of a good length outside off, struck down to extra cover
angling it in towards middle, punched down the ground to long-on for just a single
tossed up outside off, pushed straight to cover, no single available
flighted on middle, driven past the bowler and just wide of long-on, has enough time to make it back for the second
slightly short on middle, punched down the ground to long-on
slightly short on the off, jabs it back past the bowler who fumbles and allows them to come back for the second as it rolls down towards long-off
flights it towards middle, swept down behind square for just one more
Chigumbura lives up to his reputation, charging down the track and hammering that tossed-up delivery miles into the stands over deep midwicket
pushed wide of extra cover but there's no single available
fired it really quick wide of the off stump, goes for the slog-sweep but he's nowhere near it
fullish outside off, pushed wide of extra cover for a single this time
short on middle, kept really low, managed to get his bat down in time as he pushed it towards cover
tossed up on middle, pushed into the leg side just wide of midwicket for a single
angling it in towards middle, closes the face to play it into the vacant midwicket region for one more
fullish on middle and leg, driven just wide of long-on to take two
slower one cutting in from outside leg stump, defended wide of extra cover for an easy single
picked the slower one beautifully, pitched it up on middle, was right in the slot, waited for it and swung it hard just at the right time to clear deep midwicket comfortably
bowled it on a length on middle and leg, closes the face to push it past midwicket for a single
slower one bowled short on middle, slapped it off the back foot past the bowler onto the stumps at the non-striker's end, they get a single off the deflection
gets it right this time, in the blockhole outside off, dug out wide of extra cover for one more, 12 off the over, better than required
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot through extra cover but mid-off had it well covered
short on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler from the crease
flighted outside off, slow through the air, slog-swept towards deep midwicket, gets to him on the bounce and some poor throwing allows them to get back for the second
Shakib strikes! Fired it full on middle, Matsikenyeri struck it hard but straight back to the bowler, didn't get the desired elevation and Shakib reacted well to his right to pouch a sharp one
swings hard, it's tossed up outside off, lands just short of deep midwicket, a single taken
flighted, full outside off, cracked straight to cover who's right at the edge of the circle, he fumbles but they don't risk the single
shortish on leg stump, pushed to midwicket at the edge of the circle, makes it just in time
six more, doling out freebies to Chigumbura here, length ball on middle and leg, gets under it nicely and smashes it over long-on, the game is still on
shortish on middle and leg, works it wide of midwicket for just a single
slower one bowled full on leg stump, worked away to short fine for a single
lands safe, another length delivery on middle, Chigumbura swings it hard but doesn't get the elevation, long-on does well to block it inside the ropes, just a single
full on middle and leg, flicked away just wide of deep square leg, keeps them down to just a single sliding to his right
quickish on the of stump, chips it down towards long-on for a single
shortish on middle, the arm ball, punched back to the bowler
flat and quick on the off, driven with a full face towards extra cover for a single

he's given him! Chigumbura's running out of partners, round the wicket, slow through the air, pitched in line with middle and leg but didn't appear to straighten, Price went for the heave through midwicket, missed and was rapped on the pads, could have been sliding down
dropped, flighted outside off, tried to open the face as it spun away, took the outside edge and Mushfiqur was late to react moving to his right
big appeal as he fires it hard on middle and leg, gets forward to defend, is struck on the pads but the umpire is unmoved this time, would have been going down

run-out, short on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket, gets to the fielder on the bounce, Raqibul fires in a strong throw to the striker's end as Chigumbura attempts the second, appears to be a direct hit from the deep, Mushfiqur's hands are extremely close to the stumps and it might just be that he's knocked the stumps down before the ball made contact, it's a close call but the third umpire gives it out. It was a direct hit but Mushfiqur was too close to the stumps as the ball made contact. However, the decision's been made and Bangladesh have won
